title: CoverageExclusion
description: A formally approved exclusion of a coverage target or requirement from the test coverage model, documenting the rationale, accepted risk, and accountable approver per test plan scope documentation in IEEE 829-2008.

affectedTargetRef.description: ID of the testing.testcoveragetarget or testing.coveragerequirement being excluded from coverage

dateApproved.description: ISO date when the exclusion was formally approved, supporting audit trail requirements
